Recommendations: strengthen the system of disseminating the vmgo by resorting to other avenues
periodic inservice training and seminars on awareness and acceptability of the vmgo may be considered
survey research results in the level of participation in the formulation review and revision of the vmgo could be quantified to be more meaningful
evidences on job performances of faculty and staff may be documented and presented
explore other avenues in disseminating the vmgo beyond memorizing this may include determining the levels of understanding comprehension appreciation synthesis and evaluation
